pkgmetadata.longdescription: Plotting longitudinal series // Aim: Adjust the graphical parameters to create nicer longitudinal series plots. The default set of graphical parameters is very general, and can be improved upon when we are interested in plotting data points observed over time. Functions facilitate plotting those kind of series, univariate plots, bivariate plots (with vertical axis on both left and right hand sides), multivariate plots and plots which allow to examine whether a new observation is 'unusual' via construction and visualization of prediction intervals around it.
